name: Coin Crush
description:
This is a game on HEN, so lets play it. 
First you have to click on "Start Game" button at the top of the page. 
Then set similar crypto coins on triple or quad series horizontally or vertically, by mouse drag and drop. or on mobile, by click/tap over desired coin and again click/tap on destination coin to be replaced.
Note: coins can move horizontally or vertically and can't move oblique.
Each triple series has 1 point and each quad series has 2 points. 
You just have 120 seconds time to gain maximum point. 
After that there will appear an QRCode on the bottom of the game, so by scanning that, your score and name will be recorded on main server and then you can see the scoreboard. 
Top three collectors on points per each week will be announced as winners and will receive awesome NFTs by their choice of giveaway package. 
The scoreboard is common to all games listed on my page. So you can gain more points by playing even other games.

For more and future information visit 
https://games.safoura.art
discord.gg/v3HGdGuT
